verbs.description: sokoto tambuwal ‘ replaces’ dan’iya as pdp governorship candidate tambuwal name [V: may] have replaced that of the immediate past commissioner for local government affairs in the state manir dan’iya port harcourt commissioner governorship daily trust africa sahara reporters aminu waziri tambuwal pdp sokoto chairman sokoto state inec alhaji ibrahim milgoma local government affairs governor aminu waziri tambuwal
